QuestData.Title: A True Hunter
QuestData.Description:
I don't know why Hemet hunts with Razik. His contraptions are unreliable at best!
A true hunter doesn't need gadgets to hunt. They rely on instinct, skill, and agility.
So tell me, $n, do you have the skills of a true hunter? Better yet, prove it.
Take down some of the Bonebeak Hawks that circle the nearby meadow.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prove you're a worthy hunter by hunting Bonebeak Hawks in Sunfrost Glade.
QuestData.CompletionText: You can't be huntin' hawks if you're here chattin' at me.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that's how a real hunter does it.
